name: OPPO Find X - Mock up
description:
Photorealistic and flat mockup


OPPO Find X is available in two colors and with a retractable camera. Exclusive for Figma, ready for a free use. All mockup elements are fully editable, all the way down to the icons and fonts on the screen.

Specifications:

- Styles: Realistic & Flat

- Sides: Front & Back

- Camera: Retractable and Hidden

- Colors: Bordeaux Red & Glacier Blue

- Screen resolution: 1080x2340


Behance: https://www.behance.net/gallery/74262929/Realistic-Flat-Mockup-OPPO-Find-X-Free-for-Figma
